description: test input and output about dataframe

functions.description: obtain dataframe without given data, to test no input plugin
get specific data from given dataframe

source.name: dataframe
source.description: any dataframe, currently only input from obtain_df function

args.name: row
args.description: the row index of the dataframe, can be either index name or index number (0 - 9)

args.name: col
args.description: the col index of the dataframe, can be either index name or index number (0 - 9)

output.name: value
output.description: content of the cell of the dataframe with given row and col
